site.name: Accelerando IoT lab River Flooding Dashboard

name: Get River levels from BoM FTP
Strip html
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.replace(/.*METADATA,/,'').replace(/ *-->/,'');
return msg;

Help improve this site

Pick a station from one of the other tabs, and look up its normal or peak value from http://www.bom.gov.au/waterdata/, then enter the value here!
